channel.title: Initiative on Lewwwk
channel.description: Recent content in Initiative on Lewwwk

item.title: Scaling up the social finance marketplace in Canada.
item.description:
:::: entry-content Here’s an interesting map from http://www.xigi.net/ giving an overview of the latest initiative I’m co-creating. If you haven’t checked-out [xigi]{#SPELLING_ERROR_0 .blsp-spelling-error}.net… take a look. A very interesting tool that’s growing quickly and has the potential to make a significant contribution to the global marketplace that invests in good. Anyone else get the feeling that this ‘marketplace’ is really starting to take off?

::: {style=“text-align: center; border-style: solid; border-width: 2px; border-color: blue; width: 200px;”}
{decoding=“async” height=“200px” style=“border-style: none;”}

item.title: Accelerating the Collective Potential for Positive Change
item.description:
::: entry-content I’ve just come across www.slideshare.net and figured I’d try it using the latest version of the presentation (here) that I’m working with on the topic of accelerating the collection potential for positive change.

Let’s see how this works… and of course… I’m always interested in feedback! :::
